channel.title: Google Inbox on City of Wings
channel.description: Recent content in Google Inbox on City of Wings

item.title: Google Inbox-like Web Browsing
item.description: Last time, I explored the idea of designing a web browsing UI that reduces the possibility of distractions in 〈Single-minded : an Internet reader, made for readers, made by readers〉. While that idea might sound interesting, the design itself was somewhat primitive. Recently, Google has announced Inbox, a new way to handle email. And I find that many ideas behind Inbox are also applicable to web browsing as well.
